_exec_summary.SummaryText: Pikes Fertilizer is an agricultural retail fertilizer and chemical company that primarily sells anhydrous ammonia to area producers for crop enhancement.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           The plant consists of 2 tanks, one 12,000 gallon and one 8000 gallon bulk tanks.  The facility also has 20 nurse tanks.  The total capacity of the facility is 173,400 pounds of ammonia.  The facility is designed and maintained with strict accordance with all local, state, and federal standards.  The Kansas Department of Agriculture inspects our plant each year and we comply with their request for facility if necessary.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    The worst case scenario for our facility would have a toxic gas release of 53,000 lbs with a distance to endpoint of 1.60 miles and has the potential to affect approximately 20 residents.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       The employees who work in the ammonia plant are trained in safety information, hazards, operating procedures, and most importantly the maintenance pratices of our anhydrous ammonia plant.  Employees always wear safety goggles and use approp

riate gloves when filling nurse tanks.  Clean safety water is always present during ammonia operations.  We inspet our facility on a regular basis and make improvements when necessary.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     The excellent training and operation record of our company allows us to report that no injury accidents or property damage has occurred at this storage facility within the last 5 years.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            The emergency action plans have been shared and discussed with our local rural fire department and they have agreed to assist us in the event of an emergency or accidental release of anhydrous ammonis
